text: Motion
Motion

When heading towards the stage, it's not just about that
moment. Every step is a step closer to our dreams.
I've started thinking like that recently.

─The struggles and efforts I've put in while thinking
about and worrying with Amana-chan and Tenka-chan.

And with the help of Producer-san,
I've safely made it this far.
And now, finally─

Standing on this big stage at our unit live, being
able to directly convey our gratitude to the audience...

It feels like one dream has come true...
I'm smitten.

Yeah.
But that's not the end, is it?
Yes, Producer-san.

I understand now...
What lies beyond the happy ending...
─New dreams, perhaps...?

After we finish the unit live,
surely many new dreams will be born...

Even bigger stages...
A future where Alstroemeria blooms brightly...

...Haha, I see.
In that case, I...

From now on, I want to help you achieve new dreams─
to help you change, Chiyuki.

Yes!
Of course, Producer-san.

Please continue to support us.
This never-ending story, with us forever─
